channel.title: society on Leftpedia
channel.description: Recent content in society on Leftpedia

item.title: You live in society so you're either guilty or a hypocrite, so trust that the establishment will self-regulate.
item.description: The “establishment” is unabashedly guilty and even hypocritical, so why would we trust it on anything, let alone “self-regulation”? Most poor and working-class folks don’t like this setup (Capitalism); we’re just the ones explaining why this is, and how we can actually dismantle the setup (Capitalism) entirely.
